question: [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Integer Overflow] Can an attacker supply extremely large estimate_supply_value causing pool::normal_amount() to overflow at line 27, resulting in incorrect health factor calculation that bypasses liquidation checks? (Critical)

(Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Assertion Bypass] Can an attacker bypass the assert at line 24 by providing both estimate_supply_value and estimate_borrow_value as 0, then manipulating the calculation through other parameters to achieve an invalid health state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Division by Zero] What happens if dynamic_health_loan_value returns 0 at line 65, causing the function to return address::max() at line 69 - can this infinite health factor be exploited to borrow unlimited funds without collateral? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Ray Math Precision] Can ray_math::ray_div() at line 66 lose precision when dynamic_health_collateral_value is very small compared to dynamic_health_loan_value, causing an attacker to appear more healthy than they actually are? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Boolean Logic] Can an attacker exploit the is_increase boolean by setting it to false while providing large estimate_supply_value, causing negative balance calculations that underflow and create impossibly high collateral values? [File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/protocol/lending_ui/sources/calculate.move] [Function: dynamic_health_factor()] [Type Confusion] Can CoinType generic parameter be exploited by passing a malicious type that returns manipulated values from pool::normal_amount(), bypassing health checks? (High)
